Address.value: 2500 WESTCHESTER AVENUE, PURCHASE, New York, 10577, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Cognition Therapeutics Inc is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company engaged in the discovery and development of innovative, small molecule therapeutics targeting age-related degenerative diseases and disorders of the central nervous system and retina. Its lead product candidate, CT1812, is an orally delivered, small molecule antagonist designed to penetrate the blood-brain barrier and bind selectively to the S2R complex.
